mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cost_c0201 WHERE group_id = #{group_id} and hos_id = #{hos_id} and copy_code = #{copy_code} and acc_year = #{acc_year} and acc_month = #{acc_month}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO cost_c0201 ( group_id , hos_id , copy_code , acc_year , acc_month , type_code , type_name , t_1 , t_2 , t_3 , t_4 , t_5 , t_6 , t_7 , t_8
) select #{group_id} , #{hos_id} , #{copy_code} , #{acc_year} , #{acc_month} , 1 as type_code, '人员经费' as type_name, sum(t1) as t1, (sum(t1)/sum((select sum(t1) from v_cost_01 where group_id = #{group_id} and hos_id = #{hos_id} and copy_code=#{copy_code}))*100) as t2, sum(t2) as t3, (sum(t2)/sum((select sum(t2) from v_cost_01 where group_id = #{group_id} and hos_id = #{hos_id} and copy_code=#{copy_code}))*100) as t4, sum(t3) as t5, (sum(t3)/sum((select sum(t3) from v_cost_01 where group_id = #{group_id} and hos_id = #{hos_id} and copy_code=#{copy_code}))*100) as t6, sum(t4) as t7, (sum(t4)/sum((select sum(t4) from v_cost_01 where group_id = #{group_id} and hos_id = #{hos_id} and copy_code=#{copy_code}))*100) as t8 from (select sum(t1) t1, sum(t2) t2,sum(t3) t3,sum(t4) t4 from v_cost_01 where cost_item_id in (select cost_item_id from Cost_Item_Dict where cost_type_id =1 and group_id = #{group_id} and hos_id = #{hos_id} and copy_code=#{copy_code}))
union all select #{group_id} , #{hos_id} , #{copy_code} , #{acc_year} , #{acc_month} , 2 as type_code, '卫生材料费' as type_name, sum(t1) as t1, (sum(t1)/sum((select sum(t1) from v_cost_01 where group_id = #{group_id} and hos_id = #{hos_id} and copy_code=#{copy_code}))*100) as t2, sum(t2) as t3, (sum(t2)/sum((select sum(t2) from v_cost_01 where group_id = #{group_id} and hos_id = #{hos_id} and copy_code=#{copy_code}))*100) as t4, sum(t3) as t5, (sum(t3)/sum((select sum(t3) from v_cost_01 where group_id = #{group_id} and hos_id = #{hos_id} and copy_code=#{copy_code}))*100) as t6, sum(t4) as t7, (sum(t4)/sum((select sum(t4) from v_cost_01 where group_id = #{group_id} and hos_id = #{hos_id} and copy_code=#{copy_code}))*100) as t8 from (select sum(t1) t1, sum(t2) t2,sum(t3) t3,sum(t4) t4 from v_cost_01 where cost_item_id in (select cost_item_id from Cost_Item_Dict where cost_type_id =2 and group_id = #{group_id} and hos_id = #{hos_id} and copy_code=#{copy_code}))
union all select #{group_id} , #{hos_id} , #{copy_code} , #{acc_year} , #{acc_month} , 3 as type_code, '药品费' as type_name, sum(t1) as t1, (sum(t1)/sum((select sum(t1) from v_cost_01 where group_id = #{group_id} and hos_id = #{hos_id} and copy_code=#{copy_code}))*100) as t2, sum(t2) as t3, (sum(t2)/sum((select sum(t2) from v_cost_01 where group_id = #{group_id} and hos_id = #{hos_id} and copy_code=#{copy_code}))*100) as t4, sum(t3) as t5, (sum(t3)/sum((select sum(t3) from v_cost_01 where group_id = #{group_id} and hos_id = #{hos_id} and copy_code=#{copy_code}))*100) as t6, sum(t4) as t7, (sum(t4)/sum((select sum(t4) from v_cost_01 where group_id = #{group_id} and hos_id = #{hos_id} and copy_code=#{copy_code}))*100) as t8 from (select sum(t1) t1, sum(t2) t2,sum(t3) t3,sum(t4) t4 from v_cost_01 where cost_item_id in (select cost_item_id from Cost_Item_Dict where cost_type_id =3 and group_id = #{group_id} and hos_id = #{hos_id} and copy_code=#{copy_code}))
union all select #{group_id} , #{hos_id} , #{copy_code} , #{acc_year} , #{acc_month} , 4 as type_code, '固定资产折旧费' as type_name, sum(t1) as t1, (sum(t1)/sum((select sum(t1) from v_cost_01 where group_id = #{group_id} and hos_id = #{hos_id} and copy_code=#{copy_code}))*100) as t2, sum(t2) as t3, (sum(t2)/sum((select sum(t2) from v_cost_01 where group_id = #{group_id} and hos_id = #{hos_id} and copy_code=#{copy_code}))*100) as t4, sum(t3) as t5, (sum(t3)/sum((select sum(t3) from v_cost_01 where group_id = #{group_id} and hos_id = #{hos_id} and copy_code=#{copy_code}))*100) as t6, sum(t4) as t7, (sum(t4)/sum((select sum(t4) from v_cost_01 where group_id = #{group_id} and hos_id = #{hos_id} and copy_code=#{copy_code}))*100) as t8 from (select sum(t1) t1, sum(t2) t2,sum(t3) t3,sum(t4) t4 from v_cost_01 where cost_item_id in (select cost_item_id from Cost_Item_Dict where cost_type_id =4 and group_id = #{group_id} and hos_id = #{hos_id} and copy_code=#{copy_code}))
union all select #{group_id} , #{hos_id} , #{copy_code} , #{acc_year} , #{acc_month} , 5 as type_code, '无形资产摊销费' as type_name, sum(t1) as t1, (sum(t1)/sum((select sum(t1) from v_cost_01 where group_id = #{group_id} and hos_id = #{hos_id} and copy_code=#{copy_code}))*100) as t2, sum(t2) as t3, (sum(t2)/sum((select sum(t2) from v_cost_01 where group_id = #{group_id} and hos_id = #{hos_id} and copy_code=#{copy_code}))*100) as t4, sum(t3) as t5, (sum(t3)/sum((select sum(t3) from v_cost_01 where group_id = #{group_id} and hos_id = #{hos_id} and copy_code=#{copy_code}))*100) as t6, sum(t4) as t7, (sum(t4)/sum((select sum(t4) from v_cost_01 where group_id = #{group_id} and hos_id = #{hos_id} and copy_code=#{copy_code}))*100) as t8 from (select sum(t1) t1, sum(t2) t2,sum(t3) t3,sum(t4) t4 from v_cost_01 where cost_item_id in (select cost_item_id from Cost_Item_Dict where cost_type_id =5 and group_id = #{group_id} and hos_id = #{hos_id} and copy_code=#{copy_code}))
union all select #{group_id} , #{hos_id} , #{copy_code} , #{acc_year} , #{acc_month} , 6 as type_code, '提取医疗风险基金' as type_name, sum(t1) as t1, (sum(t1)/sum((select sum(t1) from v_cost_01 where group_id = #{group_id} and hos_id = #{hos_id} and copy_code=#{copy_code}))*100) as t2, sum(t2) as t3, (sum(t2)/sum((select sum(t2) from v_cost_01 where group_id = #{group_id} and hos_id = #{hos_id} and copy_code=#{copy_code}))*100) as t4, sum(t3) as t5, (sum(t3)/sum((select sum(t3) from v_cost_01 where group_id = #{group_id} and hos_id = #{hos_id} and copy_code=#{copy_code}))*100) as t6, sum(t4) as t7, (sum(t4)/sum((select sum(t4) from v_cost_01 where group_id = #{group_id} and hos_id = #{hos_id} and copy_code=#{copy_code}))*100) as t8 from (select sum(t1) t1, sum(t2) t2,sum(t3) t3,sum(t4) t4 from v_cost_01 where cost_item_id in (select cost_item_id from Cost_Item_Dict where cost_type_id =6 and group_id = #{group_id} and hos_id = #{hos_id} and copy_code=#{copy_code}))
union all select #{group_id} , #{hos_id} , #{copy_code} , #{acc_year} , #{acc_month} , 7 as type_code, '其他费用' as type_name, sum(t1) as t1, (sum(t1)/sum((select sum(t1) from v_cost_01 where group_id = #{group_id} and hos_id = #{hos_id} and copy_code=#{copy_code}))*100) as t2, sum(t2) as t3, (sum(t2)/sum((select sum(t2) from v_cost_01 where group_id = #{group_id} and hos_id = #{hos_id} and copy_code=#{copy_code}))*100) as t4, sum(t3) as t5, (sum(t3)/sum((select sum(t3) from v_cost_01 where group_id = #{group_id} and hos_id = #{hos_id} and copy_code=#{copy_code}))*100) as t6, sum(t4) as t7, (sum(t4)/sum((select sum(t4) from v_cost_01 where group_id = #{group_id} and hos_id = #{hos_id} and copy_code=#{copy_code}))*100) as t8 from(select sum(t1) t1, sum(t2) t2,sum(t3) t3,sum(t4) t4 from v_cost_01 where cost_item_id in (select cost_item_id from Cost_Item_Dict where cost_type_id =7 and group_id = #{group_id} and hos_id = #{hos_id} and copy_code=#{copy_code}))
union all
select #{group_id} , #{hos_id} , #{copy_code} , #{acc_year} , #{acc_month} , 8 as type_code, '合计' as type_name, sum(t1) t1, 100 t2, sum(t2) t3, 100 t4, sum(t3) t5, 100 t6, sum(t4) t7, 100 t8 from v_cost_01 where group_id = #{group_id} and hos_id = #{hos_id} and copy_code=#{copy_code}
